originalText.text: I was able to be seen the same day. I called they had a time schedule open. They allow me to get it. They were very professional. I ❤️ Love My experience with them. I would tell one anyone about Chelsea Vision Associates. You will not be disappointed in the way they take care of you.

text.text: I was able to be seen the same day. I called they had a time schedule open. They allow me to get it. They were very professional. I ❤️ Love My experience with them. I would tell one anyone about Chelsea Vision Associates. You will not be disappointed in the way they take care of you.

originalText.text: My first visit to Chelsea Vision Associates was a 10/10 experience. The front desk staff was accommodating, kind and polite. Dr. Gross was thorough and knowledgeable and informed me of the newest technology in contacts. I left feeling educated and at ease, which is not typical from my past experiences at optical shops. I was not pressured to purchase glasses/contacts, rather I was given the best options for my vision and then left to decide which felt best before purchasing my supply. The process was seamless start to finish from scheduling the appointment (even have the easy option to text them) to next steps on purchasing eyewear. Highly recommend going here!

originalText.text: My experience with Dr. Gross was excellent his staff was friendly and helpful. He was so knowledgeable and personable. I haven't been to an eye doctor in years and this was an exception experience.

text.text: My experience with Dr. Gross was excellent his staff was friendly and helpful. He was so knowledgeable and personable. I haven't been to an eye doctor in years and this was an exception experience.

originalText.text:
I met the team at Chelsea Vision by chance or luck as many would say. I had a “contact” emergency last week on 8/15/23 in the early morning with less than 1 hr to spare before a very important business meeting. I lost one of my contacts leaving me with partial vision. Dr. David Gross and the exceptional staff at Chelsea Vision Associates came to the rescue without hesitation. Nicole (office manager), Stephanie and James were super professional and courteous, provided me with a pair of spare contacts and had me in and out in no time. I even made it back for my business meeting with 5 min to spare!  THANK YOU!!

And the replacement lenses I received brand name “Biofinity Energys” were amazing! They felt so soft and comfortable in the eyes. I’m a new customer to both Chelsea Vision and Biofinity Energys! Thank you again!

originalText.text: Dr. Gross and his team are the friendliest, thorough, and most efficient healthcare team that I have encountered. I have been coming here for my annual eye exam for the past 3 years and buying my contacts from them. They are extremely responsive and communicative. Highly recommend you make Dr. Gross your eye doctor.
